changeSet.author: system
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO card (id, name, surname, card_no, expire_date, cvc, balance, currency, card_type, status, credit_limit, spending_limit, country, fraud_risk_score, otp_required, last_transaction_time, subscription_enabled, outstanding_debt, scheduled_payment_enabled, created_date, last_modified_date) VALUES (CAST('1' AS BIGINT), 'Donald', 'Trump', '5105105105105100', '01/26', '123', 400.0, 'USD', 'CREDIT', 'ACTIVE', 5000.0, 1000.0, 'USA', 10, true, '2024-10-21 10:50:00', true, 100.0, true, '2024-10-22 10:50:00', '2024-10-22 10:53:00'), (CAST('2' AS BIGINT), 'Joe', 'Biden', '4012888888881881', '02/25', '456', 250.0, 'EUR', 'DEBIT', 'ACTIVE', NULL, 500.0, 'Germany', 15, false, '2024-10-21 10:51:00', true, NULL, false, '2024-10-22 10:51:00', '2024-10-22 10:53:00'), (CAST('3' AS BIGINT), 'Barack', 'Obama', '5555555555554444', '03/27', '789', 150.5, 'GBP', 'CREDIT', 'BLOCKED', 3000.0, 750.0, 'UK', 25, true, '2024-10-20 10:52:00', false, 50.5, true, '2024-10-22 10:52:00', '2024-10-22 10:53:00'), (CAST('4' AS BIGINT), 'Angela', 'Merkel', '4111111111111111', '04/28', '321', 300.75, 'JPY', 'DEBIT', 'ACTIVE', NULL, 1000.0, 'Japan', 5, true, '2024-10-21 10:53:00', true, NULL, false, '2024-10-22 10:53:00', '2024-10-22 10:53:00');
